modules.name: Software Engineering
modules.moduleOverview: Software Engineering is one of the most essential skills for work in the software development industry. You will gain an understanding of the issues involved in designing and creating software systems from an industry perspective.

modules.name: Data Structures and Algorithms
modules.moduleOverview: Assessment for this module involves four blackboard quizzes, each on different topics and two online exams, part 1 on material taught in weeks 1-6 (taken before Easter), part 2 on material in weeks 7-12 (taken in the week after the end of term).
